plot: A schizophrenic painter struggles to sell his art work, but when his only friend-a neighbor-discovers his secret past and involvement in a radical organization, he is forced to face his past and use it as a tool to success.
title: Underground Story
plot_es: A schizophrenic painter struggles to sell his art work, but when his only friend-a neighbor-discovers his secret past and involvement in a radical organization, he is forced to face his past and use it as a tool to success.
plot_en: A schizophrenic painter struggles to sell his art work, but when his only friend-a neighbor-discovers his secret past and involvement in a radical organization, he is forced to face his past and use it as a tool to success.
